data.title: Fermi AI energy start-up soars on Nasdaq, plans massive nuclear and renewable power campus
data.description: Fermi AI Energy IPO, co-founded by Rick Perry, is a new company building big energy and AI data centres in Texas. Its shares rose on Nasdaq, and it will also trade in London to attract global investors. The company plans nuclear, gas, and renewable power to meet growing AI electricity needs, raising billions from its IPO.
data.keywords: fermi stock, Fermi AI energy, Fermi IPO 2025, Rick Perry start-up, AI data centres, Nuclear power campus, Nasdaq LSE dual listing, Texas energy project, Renewable energy for AI, Fermi stock news
